Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Okay lets tackle this problem step by step First I need to understand the normative rules and the desiderata separately Starting with the normative rules 1 The sequence must be Application Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Inform Applicant If Approved Finalize Documentation Close Case 2 Specific ordering rules Credit Check before Risk Assessment Risk Assessment before Loan Decision Inform Applicant after Loan Decision If approved Finalize Documentation before Close Case If rejected do not finalize documentation before closing 3 Whats not allowed Skipping activities Changing the order Finalize Documentation after a rejection Closing the case without following the decision logic

Text: Now looking at the event log for each case Case 1 Application Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Approved Inform Applicant Finalize Documentation Close Case This looks perfect It follows the sequence exactly as required No violations here

Text: Case 3 Application Received Credit Check more than 24 hours later Risk Assessment Loan Decision Approved Inform Applicant later than 48 hours Finalize Documentation Close Case The sequence is correct but the timing is off for Credit Check and Inform Applicant However these are desiderata violations not normative ones Also theres no Followup Call which is another desideratum

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: But remember desiderata violations are not severe Now for the desiderata Credit Check within 24 hours Inform Applicant within 48 hours of loan decision Followup Call before closing encouraged but not required In Case 3 timings violated no Followup But lets check Case 1 and Case 2 for desiderata too Case 1 Credit Check 900 to 930 30 minutes OK Inform 1100 to 1300 2 hours OK Followup Call Not mentioned but not required Case 2 Credit Check within 1 hour OK Inform not listed Followup not present but problem only notes for Case 3 Long deliberation on whether Followup missing in all cases or only Case 3 since only noted for Case 3 assume only Case 3 for desiderata

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Wait lets look at Case 2 again Application Received Risk Assessment Credit Check Loan Decision Rejected Finalize Documentation Close Case Missing Inform Applicant after Loan Decision Thats a problem The normative sequence requires Inform Applicant after Loan Decision So in Case 2 they skipped Inform Applicant another normative violation So Case 2 has three normative violations 1 Risk Assessment before Credit Check 2 Finalize Documentation after rejection 3 Missing Inform Applicant step
